description: A simple map of a two-bedroom home;

rooms.name: The Front Porch
rooms.description:
You are on the front porch of your good friend Billy's house. You and Billy often play Hide and Seek at his house.
Billy runs into the front door, calling back, "I'll be hiding inside! Try to find me!"

exits.text: count to 100 and enter the house to the north

rooms.name: The Foyer
rooms.description: You are in a cozy tiled foyer. The north side of the foyer opens into the hall.

exits.text: go northeast to Billy's parents' room
go southwest to the dining room
go northwest to the living room

rooms.name: The Coat Closet
rooms.description: You are in a dark closet.

rooms.name: Billy's Parents' Room
rooms.description: You are Billy's Parents' Bedroom. He's not allowed to play in here.

rooms.name: Billy's Room
rooms.description: You are in Billy's Room. It's a mess.

rooms.name: The Dining Room
rooms.description: You are in the dining room.

exits.text: go northeast to the living room
go southeast to the dining room
go south to the laundry room

rooms.name: The Laundry Room
rooms.description: You are in the laundry room.

rooms.name: The Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the living room. That's a big TV.
